component.name: Emoji Mart
component.summary: A modern popup emoji picker for desktop, based on the Emoji Mart web component.

description.p: Launch the emoji picker with your favorite keyboard shortcut, and select an emoji to paste in the clipboard, or directly in the focused text input on X11.
